text:
Hepatic cyst associated with Peutz-Jeghers syndrome.
 A solitary hepatic cyst, associated with Peutz-Jeghers syndrome, is described.
 To our knowledge, this association has not been previously reported.
 A developmental anomaly or hamartomatous nature of this lesion is suggested.
 Knowledge of this association may be helpful in the clinical diagnosis of this benign entity.
